mutants.code:
def willItFly(q, w):
    is_palindrome = q != q[::-1]
    total_sum = sum(q)
    return is_palindrome and total_sum <= w

def willItFly(q, w):
    is_palindrome = q == q[::-1]
    total_sum = sum(q)
    return is_palindrome or total_sum <= w

def willItFly(q, w):
    is_palindrome = q == q[::-1]
    total_sum = sum(q)
    return is_palindrome and total_sum < w

def willItFly(q, w):
    is_palindrome = q == q[::-1]
    total_sum = sum(q)
    return is_palindrome and total_sum > w

def willItFly(q, w):
    is_palindrome = q == q[::-1]
    total_sum = sum(q)
    return is_palindrome and total_sum == w

def willItFly(q, w):
    is_palindrome = q == q[::+1]
    total_sum = sum(q)
    return is_palindrome and total_sum <= w

def willItFly(q, w):
    is_palindrome = q == q[::-2]
    total_sum = sum(q)
    return is_palindrome and total_sum <= w

def willItFly(q, w):
    is_palindrome = q == q[::-0]
    total_sum = sum(q)
    return is_palindrome and total_sum <= w

def willItFly(q, w):
    is_palindrome = q == q[::-0]
    total_sum = sum(q)
    return is_palindrome and total_sum <= w

def willItFly(q, w):
    is_palindrome = q == q[::--1]
    total_sum = sum(q)
    return is_palindrome and total_sum <= w
